blogs.title: Why AI Coding "Sucks": It's Not the Models, It's Your Prompts
blogs.excerpt: A 2025 deep dive into context window abuse and the LLM skill gap. Learn why 84% of developers use AI tools but 66% struggle with almost-right outputs, and how to fix it.

blogs.title: Agentic AI Takes Center Stage: Market Growth, Enterprise Adoption, and My Picks for the Best Autonomous Agents
blogs.excerpt: Deep dive into the explosive growth of agentic AI in 2025. Market projections hitting $93B by 2032, enterprise adoption stats, workflow automation trends, scaling challenges, and my top picks for autonomous agents.

blogs.title: The Ultimate AI Models Showdown: December 2025 Edition
blogs.excerpt: An honest, no-holds-barred comparison of Claude Opus 4.5, GPT-5.1, Gemini 3 Pro, and Grok 4.1. Real opinions from a data scientist who uses them daily.
